title: Can you buy the Captain Gangplank skin after the event ends?
body:
What the thread says. I don't currently own GP, but I was going to get him eventually, so I was wondering if people will be able to buy the Captain Gangplank skin even if they don't own GP and play him during the event? I haven't seen any reds comment on this.

Rioter input is appreciated!

replies.body: You'll be able to purchase Captain Gangplank at a later date for 975 RP.
Yeah, it should really be sold as a 750 RP (or _maybe_ 975) skin afterwards.  That's about what it's worth IMO.
i prefered him death cause i love Miss Fortune
It's free if you've played the updated Gangplank prior to him dying from what I've heard.
